name: Pizza
details: Pizza is a savory dish typically made with a tomato sauce base, cheese, and various toppings such as vegetables, meats, and herbs.

name: Sushi
details: Sushi is a Japanese dish that typically consists of raw fish, cooked rice, and seaweed. It is often served with soy sauce.

name: Burgers
details: Burgers are a popular fast food item that typically consists of a ground beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, and a bun. They can be customized with various toppings and sauces.

name: Tacos
details: Tacos are a Mexican dish that typically consists of a corn or wheat tortilla filled with various ingredients such as meat, vegetables, cheese, and salsa.

name: Pad Thai
details: Pad Thai is a Thai dish made with stir-fried rice noodles, vegetables, eggs, tofu, and often shrimp or chicken.

name: Schnitzel
details: Schnitzel is a German dish made with a thin slice of meat that is breaded and fried until crispy.
